content: {"locationId": "8771", "organizationId": "7212", "name": "The Lord's Harvest", "address1": "1020 Sunset Dr", "address2": "", "city": "El Reno", "state": "OK", "zipCode": "73036", "country": null, "phone": "405-422-2001", "phoneExt": "", "website": "https://www.thelordsharvest.org/", "latitude": "35.53254", "longitude": "-97.96474", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution, Hot/Cold Meal Program", "serviceAreas": "CITY:  Calumet, Cedar Lake, El Reno, Okarche, Union City", "languages": "English, Spanish", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "The Lord's Harvest is located at 1020 Sunset Drive in El Reno, Oklahoma. Our building is on a corner lot. Look for the white building with a purple roof and trim. We are a donation based organization that provides to the people of the community. The Lord's Harvest is guided by the teachings of Jesus to feed the hungry and take care of those in need. Working with a variety of partners who support its efforts, The Lord's Harvest offers a selection of programs to help eliminate hunger in the community and provide for those in times of need. The Lord's Harvest makes a difference one blessing at a time.", "notes": "The Lord's Harvest is closed on Tuesdays. The Lord's Harvest is also closed on Saturdays and Sundays for prep work for the following week of services.   Oklahoma Law states no person shall stop, stand or park a vehicle within a street, or alley in such position as to block a driveway entrance to any property. As such, it is illegal for you to block a public or private driveway anywhere. Please DO NOT block any driveways or alleys when you visit The Lord\u2019s Harvest building. If you have any questions regarding this statement, please email The Lord\u2019s Harvest at thelordsharvest@coxinet.net or contact our office directly by phone (405)422-2001.", "contactName": "Nikki Pruitt", "contactPhone": "405-422-2001", "contactEmail": "thelordsharvest@coxinet.net", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Home Delivery Options, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 64, "regionName": "Regional Food Bank of Oklahoma", "logoBlobNameSmall": "b268ff1b-39fa-45f4-a37e-421975c3f339.png", "website": "https://www.regionalfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Monday 11:00 AM-1:00 PM", "Monday 1:00 PM-4:00 PM (Lunch 11-1)", "Wednesday 11:00 AM-1:00 PM", "Wednesday 1:00 PM-4:00 PM (Lunch 11-1)", "Thursday 5:00 PM-7:30 PM (Lunch 11-1)", "Friday 1:00 PM-2:30 PM (Lunch 11-1)"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
